feed.title: Tag: stowe | thecave | A Hideout for Programmers, Indie Devs, Solopreneurs

entry.title: Wow! Busy weekends ahead
entry.description: A friend emailed me asking if I’m around in two weekends. He wants to visit me in Stowe and do a little riding together. I haven’t seen this friend in years, and it will be great to catch up ago. The problem is, I discovered I’m busy every weekend through the end of March. Turns out, when you live in a ski town, lots of people want to come for a visit.
entry.content:
A friend emailed me asking if I’m around in two weekends. He wants to visit me in Stowe and do a little riding together. I haven’t seen this friend in years, and it will be great to catch up ago. The problem is, I discovered I’m busy every weekend through the end of March. Turns out, when you live in a ski town, lots of people want to come for a visit.

So if you want to visit me in Stowe, and you want to ride together, it’ll have to be during the weekday or a weekend towards the end of March beginning of April.

And in case you’re wondering, the skiing and riding in Stowe has been superb recently.

entry.title: Two Years Ago Today
entry.description: We moved to Stowe two years ago today. It seems like we’ve been here a lot longer, but in a good way.
entry.content: We moved to Stowe two years ago today. It seems like we’ve been here a lot longer, but in a good way.

entry.title: Video of Stowe, Vermont
entry.description: My friend Ashley came across another video of Vermont. This time it’s about Stowe, the town I live in. Enjoy.
entry.content:
My friend Ashley came across another video of Vermont. This time it’s about Stowe, the town I live in. Enjoy.

The video is from VermontScapes. Go checkout the site if you want to see more beautiful photos of Vermont and the Stowe area.

entry.title: Snow River At Stowe
entry.description: This looks like it was a lot of fun. Wish I had known about it when it happened last year.
entry.content: This looks like it was a lot of fun. Wish I had known about it when it happened last year.
